Package com.intland.codebeamer.remoting

Provides a web service based Remote API for external clients to interact with CodeBeamer's internal resources.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ArtifactOperation Deprecated
    since CB-5.5.0 only retained for RemoteApi backwards compatibility
    ArtifactType
    Artifact type constants.
    DescriptionFormat
    Description format constants.
    GroupType
    Group type constants.
    RemoteApi
    Defines the CodeBeamer RemoteService API.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DecoratorSerializerFactory
    Hessian SerializerFactory which delegates all tasks to an other factory, but for a certain class (and its subclasses) allows to alter the instances of the class before-serialization and after-deserialization
    GroupTypeClassUtils
    Helper class to resolve group-type to their DTO classes.
    RemoteApi.BatchMethodCall
    Arguments for the method will be called on the server side in #see batch() call
    RemoteApi.BatchMethodResult<T>
    The result of each call.
    RemoteApiFactory
    A special HessianProxyFactory for stateful RemoteService connections
    RemoteApiProxy
    A special InvocationHandler around a HessianProxy for the RemoteApi to cache session specific information locally on the client
    RemoteApiServiceExporter
    Codebeamer specific Spring hessian-service exporter.
    RemoteServiceSerializerFactory
    A special SerializerFactory for RemoteService objects, especially BinaryStreamDto
    RemoteSession
    Wraps a remote session.
    ReportType
    Defines the type of reports available in the system.
    ThrowableSerializer
    A special serializer for Throwables, that doesn't expose serialize nested cause.

Package com.intland.codebeamer.remoting Description

Provides a web service based Remote API for external clients to interact with CodeBeamer's internal resources.

For more details, documentation and tutorials related to CodeBeamer's Remote API, please visit the CodeBeamer project at www.codebeamer.com.
